goal: Finalize the blueprint entity system with reusable recipes and clearer progress reporting.
decisions: Maintain a recipe registry keyed by target_item that includes required materials, starting progress (empty), and time_cost in minutes.
Blueprint status strings should show per-material progress (current/required) plus the total build time so examine/create surfaces the plan.
Integrate the improved status helpers with the universal use/create flows while keeping persistence compatible (player.active_project).
plan: Define blueprint recipes for survival items (stone knife, stone axe, campfire, cordage) with their time costs.
Refactor Blueprint construction/status helpers to use the recipe data and expose progress strings.
Update create/examine/use flows to surface the richer blueprint progress info.
notes: Blueprints serialize via serde in player.active_project; keep the stored shape stable while adding helper data.
time_cost is minutes; action ticks are 10 minutes when converting to ActionSuccess.
